div.p: A virtual experience for content developers. ConVEx is an immersive experience designed from the ground up to bring you a wealth of ideas and information to support your efforts in defining and executing a comprehensive content strategy.

Established in the fall of 1999, this two-and-a-half-day conference remains the premier annual conference where managers and senior leaders meet to collaborate on best practices in information development.

Established in 2015, this two-day on-line conference is held twice a year in both winter and summer and aims a spotlight on a single industry trending topic. IDEAS focuses on Information, Development, Exploration, Application, & Solutions.

New in the spring of 2020, this two-and-a-half-day conference invites leaders from all content-producing organizations within a corporation to focus their collective attention on the needs of the customer at each major customer contact point.
Journeys is replaced by ConVEx for 2021

Established in the spring of 1999, this two-and-a-half-day conference is designed to provide strategies that information developers can implement as they create and manage technical content using XML architectures such as DITA.
DITA North America is replaced by ConVEx for 2021
Established in the late fall of 2005, to respond to the demand of European information developers, this two-day conference is the European equivalent of DITA North America.
DITA Europe is replaced by ConVEx for 2021
